scripts.check: yarn run type && yarn run lint
scripts.docs: yarn run build && cd website && yarn run start
scripts.build:deploy: cd packages/plugin && yarn run build --cwd packages/plugin
scripts.pack: rimraf packages/plugin/tsconfig.lib.tsbuildinfo && packemon pack --addEngines --declaration --cwd packages/plugin && node ./scripts/revertPackemon.js
scripts.release: yarn run pack && yarn run check && lerna-release
